title: Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore: Inland Lakes
body: Inland Lakes       There are 21 lakes within the boundaries of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore. You will find a short description and directions to each lake below. They are categorized by general area within the Lakeshore. The content of the following pages is based on an article by Jane Greiner published in the Glen Arbor Sun on June 29, 2006. Northern Area Bass Lake School Lake Narada Lake Shell Lake Hidden Lake Glen Arbor and Empire Area Tucker Lake Mill Pond North Bar Lake Taylor Lake Platte Plains Area Otter Lake Bass Lake Deer Lake Southern Area Mud Lake Loon Lake Round Lake Bow Lakes (3 Lakes) Manitou Islands Lake Manitou - North Manitou Tamarack Lake - North Manitou Florence Lake - South Manitou
